Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

# trackGroups

**Type Property**

The track groups an asset contains.

## Declaration

```swift
static var trackGroups: AVAsyncProperty<Root, [AVAssetTrackGroup]> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

The value is an empty array if the asset has no track groups.
